verses.verse: אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am חֲבַצֶּ֣לֶת <S%H2261><s%> I [am] the rose הַשָּׁר֔וֹן <S%H8289><s%> of Sharon שֽׁוֹשַׁנַּ֖ת <S%H7799><s%> [and] the lily הָעֲמָקִֽים׃ <S%H6010><s%> of the valleys

כְּשֽׁוֹשַׁנָּה֙ <S%H7799><s%> As the lily בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among הַחוֹחִ֔ים <S%H2336><s%> among thorns כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So רַעְיָתִ֖י <S%H7474><s%> so [is] my love בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among הַבָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> among the daughters

כְּתַפּ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H8598><s%> As the apple tree בַּעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> among the trees הַיַּ֔עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the wood כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> So דּוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> so [is] my beloved בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among הַבָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> among the sons בְּצִלּוֹ֙ <S%H6738><s%> down under his shadow חִמַּ֣דְתִּי <S%H2530><s%> with great delight וְיָשַׁ֔בְתִּי <S%H3427><s%> I sat וּפִרְי֖וֹ <S%H6529><s%> and his fruit מָת֥וֹק <S%H4966><s%> [was] sweet לְחִכִּֽי׃ <S%H2441><s%> to my taste

הֱבִיאַ֙נִי֙ <S%H935><s%> He brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַיָּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> me to the banqueting וְדִגְל֥וֹ <S%H1714><s%> and his banner עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> over אַהֲבָֽה׃ <S%H160><s%> over me [was] love

סַמְּכ֙וּנִי֙ <S%H5564><s%> Stay בָּֽאֲשִׁישׁ֔וֹת <S%H809><s%> me with flagons רַפְּד֖וּנִי <S%H7502><s%> comfort בַּתַּפּוּחִ֑ים <S%H8598><s%> me with apples כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חוֹלַ֥ת <S%H2470><s%> for I [am] sick אַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> of love אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

שְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <S%H8040><s%> His left hand תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> be under לְרֹאשִׁ֔י <S%H7218><s%> [is] under my head וִימִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> and his right hand תְּחַבְּקֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2263><s%> doth embrace

הִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> I charge אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> you O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem בִּצְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6643><s%> by the roes א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> and בְּאַיְל֣וֹת <S%H355><s%> by the hinds הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field אִם־ <S%H518><s%> not תָּעִ֧ירוּ ׀ <S%H5782><s%> that ye stir not up וְֽאִם־ <S%H518><s%> or תְּעֽוֹרְר֛וּ <S%H5782><s%> nor awake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> [my] love עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> till he please ס

ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> The voice דּוֹדִ֔י <S%H1730><s%> of my beloved הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he בָּ֑א <S%H935><s%> behold he cometh מְדַלֵּג֙ <S%H1801><s%> leaping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains מְקַפֵּ֖ץ <S%H7092><s%> skipping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּבָעֽוֹת׃ <S%H1389><s%> upon the hills

דּוֹמֶ֤ה <S%H1819><s%> is like דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> My beloved לִצְבִ֔י <S%H6643><s%> a roe א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לְעֹ֣פֶר <S%H6082><s%> or a young הָֽאַיָּלִ֑ים <S%H354><s%> hart הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> he עוֹמֵד֙ <S%H5975><s%> behold he standeth אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> behind כָּתְלֵ֔נוּ <S%H3796><s%> our wall מַשְׁגִּ֙יחַ֙ <S%H7688><s%> he looketh forth מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> through הַֽחֲלֹּנ֔וֹת <S%H2474><s%> at the windows מֵצִ֖יץ <S%H6692><s%> shewing מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> through הַֽחֲרַכִּֽים׃ <S%H2762><s%> himself through the lattice

עָנָ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> spake דוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> My beloved וְאָ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> and said לִ֑י ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> unto me Rise up לָ֛ךְ רַעְיָתִ֥י <S%H7474><s%> my love יָפָתִ֖י <S%H3303><s%> my fair one וּלְכִי־ <S%H1980><s%> and come לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold [הַסְּתָו כ] (הַסְּתָ֖יו <S%H5638><s%> winter ק) עָבָ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> is past הַגֶּ֕שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> the rain חָלַ֖ף <S%H2498><s%> is over הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [and] gone לֽוֹ׃

הַנִּצָּנִים֙ <S%H5339><s%> The flowers נִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> appear בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> on the earth עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> the time הַזָּמִ֖יר <S%H2158><s%> of the singing הִגִּ֑יעַ <S%H5060><s%> [of birds] is come וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice הַתּ֖וֹר <S%H8449><s%> of the turtle נִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> is heard בְּאַרְצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H776><s%> in our land

הַתְּאֵנָה֙ <S%H8384><s%> The fig tree חָֽנְטָ֣ה <S%H2590><s%> putteth forth פַגֶּ֔יהָ <S%H6291><s%> her green figs וְהַגְּפָנִ֥ים ׀ <S%H1612><s%> and the vines סְמָדַ֖ר <S%H5563><s%> [with] the tender grape נָ֣תְנוּ <S%H5414><s%> give רֵ֑יחַ <S%H7381><s%> a [good] smell ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise [לְכִי כ] (לָ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and come ק) רַעְיָתִ֥י <S%H7474><s%> my love יָפָתִ֖י <S%H3303><s%> my fair one וּלְכִי־ <S%H1980><s%> and come לָֽךְ׃ ס

יוֹנָתִ֞י <S%H3123><s%> O my dove בְּחַגְוֵ֣י <S%H2288><s%> [that art] in the clefts הַסֶּ֗לַע <S%H5553><s%> of the rock בְּסֵ֙תֶר֙ <S%H5643><s%> in the secret הַמַּדְרֵגָ֔ה <S%H4095><s%> [places] of the stairs הַרְאִ֙ינִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> let me see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַרְאַ֔יִךְ <S%H4758><s%> thy countenance הַשְׁמִיעִ֖ינִי <S%H8085><s%> let me hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H6963><s%> thy voice כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For קוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H6963><s%> [is] thy voice עָרֵ֖ב <S%H6156><s%> for sweet וּמַרְאֵ֥יךְ <S%H4758><s%> and thy countenance נָאוֶֽה׃ <S%H5000><s%> [is] comely ס

אֶֽחֱזוּ־ <S%H270><s%> Take לָ֙נוּ֙ שֽׁוּעָלִ֔ים <S%H7776><s%> us the foxes שֽׁוּעָלִ֥ים <S%H7776><s%> foxes קְטַנִּ֖ים <S%H6996><s%> the little מְחַבְּלִ֣ים <S%H2254><s%> that spoil כְּרָמִ֑ים <S%H3754><s%> the vines וּכְרָמֵ֖ינוּ <S%H3754><s%> for our vines סְמָדַֽר׃ <S%H5563><s%> [have] tender grapes
דּוֹדִ֥י <S%H1730><s%> My beloved לִי֙ וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I ל֔וֹ הָרֹעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> [is] mine and I [am] his he feedeth בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <S%H7799><s%> among the lilies

עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁיָּפ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H6315><s%> break הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Until the day וְנָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> flee away הַצְּלָלִ֑ים <S%H6752><s%> and the shadows סֹב֩ <S%H5437><s%> turn דְּמֵה־ <S%H1819><s%> and be thou like לְךָ֨ דוֹדִ֜י <S%H1730><s%> my beloved לִצְבִ֗י <S%H6643><s%> a roe א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or לְעֹ֥פֶר <S%H6082><s%> or a young הָאַיָּלִ֖ים <S%H354><s%> hart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֥רֵי <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains בָֽתֶר׃ <S%H1335><s%> part ס
